About.Hours & facilities: Open by appointment only. Reference assistance available in person. No copying services available.

About.Access: Two to three days' written notice of intention to visit required.

About.Acquisition focus: Material from past students; material on future plans of the school; photographs; curriculum.

About.Major holdings: Geelong Grammar School: Building plans 1953- (0.5m) Photographs 1953-(2m) News cuttings 1953- (0.5m)

About.References: Montgomerie, E H, The Timbertop Experience, 1957

Contact.Street address: Timbertop P.B., Geelong Grammar School, Mansfield 3722
